preferred_name: Preferred IUPAC or common name of the molecule
alias_tag: One or two common synonyms (comma‑separated, or 'n.a.')
chem_tag: Primary chemical / usage class (e.g. purine alkaloid, organophosphate)
hazard_tag: Qualitative hazard + GHS pictogram text (e.g. harmful if swallowed; pictogram: exclamation)
solubility_tag: Qualitative solubility class derived from logS (e.g. very soluble, sparingly soluble)
logp: Numeric logP value as string, or 'n.a.'
spectra_tag: Available spectra types (comma‑separated, e.g. 1D NMR, 2D NMR, MS, UV, IR, Raman)
notable_peak: Key UV λmax or MS m/z peak (e.g. 274 nm or m/z 194)
